text: Schisandra repanda is a deciduous vine growing to 6 meters, endemic to Japan and Korea. ==Synonyms== * Maximowiczia nigra (Maxim.) Nakai * Schisandra discolor Nakai * Schisandra nigra Maxim. ==References== * Sitzungsber. Math.-Phys. Cl. Königl. Bayer. Akad. Wiss. München 16: 303 1886. * JSTOR * Plants for a Future Category:Austrobaileyales Category:Flora of Japan Category:Flora of Korea
title: Schisandra repanda
